text: - NARRATOR: After a lifetime of being the world's most famous enemies,
- NARRATOR: Tom and Jerry are about to start over...
- TERRANCE: This hotel has been host to four presidents, three popes, two kings,
and we're about to host the wedding of the century.
- Do you think you're qualified to take on this position?
- I shine under pressure, like a diamond.
Or Rihanna. [ laughs, snorts ] - MR. DUBROS: One other thing.
We have a mouse problem. - With a what now?
- I'll catch it, sir. - Oh, wow. This is so detailed.
We could hire an exterminator... or we can leverage millions of years of predatory evolution.
- Oh! - TERRANCE: If a picture of this mouse
is tweeted out to InstaBookFace or Ticky Tok, we will be ruined.
- No, sir. That's not gonna happen.
That rodent is toast. - I will not let this hotel be ruined
by a cat and a mouse!
- He's toying with us. - I think I might have just pulled this off.
